name: Kjotsuñi
description:
Theme: Latin American mythology.

Diversifiers: Mix it all up, Inclusive narratives through representativeness, Code ZeroZero, Count on me.

Cathegory: #Diversity, #Pc

Controls:
WASD: Movement 
Right Click: Heavy punch 
Left Click: Light punch 
Espace: Jump

Team
Cristian Quispe Alejandro: Sound Designer.
Ismael David Angulo Andrade: Programmer.
Kennia Adaía Flores Rojas: Administrator/Voice actor.
Sergio Paulo Ochoa Ledezma: Graphic Designer.

Engine:
Unreal Engine 4.

City:
La Paz-Bolivia.
